attributes.action: save the bbc asian network from closing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the bbc asian network is vital for the asian community and enduces a sence of belonging and companionship. closing the bbc asian network will damage labours reputation and deal a blow to the asian community. so we say no to the shutting down and yes to saving the asian network

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
